amendment.description: To amend provisions relating to the study group regarding simplifying the process of applying for Federal financial aid.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2373 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2373 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Burr. (consideration: CR S9738-9739; text: CR S9738) To amend provisions relating to the study group regarding simplifying the process of applying for Federal financial aid.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2373 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Burr.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2373 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
